code: import{createUseStyles}from'react-jss';var Styles=createUseStyles({page:{padding:'10px 150px 10px 150px',marginBottom:'10px','& h1.title':{color:'#2d3748',fontWeight:'700',fontSize:'3rem',maxWidth:'450px'},'@media screen and (max-width: 576px)':{'& h1.title':{fontSize:'2rem'}},'& .paragraph':{color:'#718096',fontWeight:'500',maxWidth:'500px',fontSize:'1.3rem','& span':{fontWeight:'700',color:'#4a5568'}},'& h3.title':{color:'#2d3748',fontWeight:'500',maxWidth:'250px',position:'relative','& .bold':{fontWeight:'700'}},'& .features':{'& .title':{color:'#2d3748',fontWeight:'600'},'& .description':{color:'#718096',fontWeight:'400',maxWidth:'300px'}},'& .our-mission':{'& .paragraph':{fontSize:'1.1rem'}},'@media screen and (min-width: 992px)':{'& h3.title':{'&:after':{content:'""',position:'absolute',bottom:13,width:'50px',display:'inline',borderTop:"3px solid ".concat('#cbd5e0')}},'& .features':{'& h3.title':{'&:after':{right:-70}}},'& .our-mission':{'& h3.title':{'&:after':{right:0}}}}}});export default Styles;
